siteMetadata.title: Ghost Docs
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about working with the Ghost professional publishing platform.

ghostPost.title: Does Ghost(Pro) support other CDN providers?
ghostPost.excerpt: Ghost(Pro) has a deep integration with Cloudflare as the edge CDN.
ghostPost.meta_title: Does Ghost(Pro) support other CDN providers? - FAQ
ghostPost.meta_description: Ghost(Pro) has a deep integration with Cloudflare as the edge CDN. Read more about supported CDN infrastructure.

primary_tag.name: Ghost(Pro)

primary_tag.meta_description: If you get stuck, browse our commonly asked questions, or contact email support for Ghost(Pro) premium hosted customers!

tags.name: Ghost(Pro)
tags.description: Commonly asked questions and support for Ghost(Pro) customers!
tags.meta_description: If you get stuck, browse our commonly asked questions, or contact email support for Ghost(Pro) premium hosted customers!
tags.meta_title: Ghost(Pro) FAQs – Find answers & support for your site

ghostPost.plaintext:
Ghost(Pro) is a fully managed service with an end-to-end infrastructure and a
deep integration with Cloudflare as the edge CDN, which is configured and
optimised to serve your site with the best performance possible.

Using other CDNs on top of this infrastructure is not supported, as edge
stacking significantly degrades performance and causes problems.
ghostPost.html:
Ghost(Pro) is a fully managed service with an end-to-end infrastructure and a deep integration with Cloudflare as the edge CDN, which is configured and optimised to serve your site with the best performance possible.

Using other CDNs on top of this infrastructure is not supported, as edge stacking significantly degrades performance and causes problems.
